**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 223 1.1 **Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=270) **Prerequisites** [Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6446) **Requirements** You have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90). --- Heaving both yourself and your opponent into the air, you bring them crashing to the ground. Make an unarmed melee Strike against the creature you have [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90). This Strike deals 1d6 additional damage per weapon damage die, and it has the following additional effects on a success, failure, and critical failure. **Success** The target lands [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88).
**Failure** You lose your grip on the target, and it is no longer grabbed or restrained by you.
**Critical Failure** You lose both your grip on the target and your balance. You fall prone, and the target is no longer grabbed or restrained by you.
name: Aerial Piledriver
requirement: You have a creature  grabbed  or  restrained .
